head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths POLLENS, PAULINE LEVINE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths POLLENS, PAULINE LEVINE

block.p: POLLENS--Pauline Levine, 91, died on December 16, 2003, devoted wife of the late Dr. Bertram Pollens, beloved mother of sons, Martin and Richard Pollens, and daughter Linda Sherman, loving grandmother of Jason Pollens, Daniel and Benjamin Sherman. Graveside services at Beth El Cemetery, Paramus, NJ, 11 AM, Friday, December 19th. Donations to Alzheimers Foundation would be appreciated.
